field.name: consistent_read
field.description: If true, a strongly consistent read is used; if false (the default), an eventually consistent read is used.

field.name: node_ref
field.description: When "node_ref" is supplied it SHOULD be used to perform the request. The "node_ref" and "slug" are analogous to protobuf unions in that only one of these should exist and the priority of selection is as ordered in this schema.

field.name: qname
field.description: The "qname" field should be populated when the request is not using "node_ref", e.g. "acme:article"
